Ilam is shaded in light blue second from top. |pushpin_map = |pushpin_label_position = bottom |pushpin_mapsize = 300 |pushpin_map_caption = Location in Nepal |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = |subdivision_type1 = Zone |subdivision_name1 = Mechi Zone |subdivision_type2 = District |subdivision_name2 = Ilam District |Number of political divisions = |government_footnotes = |government_type = Ilam Metropolitan City |leader_title = |leader_name = |leader_title1 = |leader_name1 = |established_title = |established_date = |unit_pref = |area_footnotes = |area_total_km2 = |population_as_of = 2011 |population_footnotes = |population_note = |population_total = 19427 |population_density_km2 = |population_density_sq_mi = |population_metro = |population_density_metro_km2 = |population_density_metro_sq_mi = |population_urban = |population_density_urban_km2 = |population_density_urban_sq_mi = |population_blank1_title = Ethnicities |population_blank1 =Brahmin, Chhetri, Limbu, Rai, Gurung |population_blank2_title = Religions |population_blank2 =Hinduism, Buddhist and Kirat |timezone = Nepal Time |utc_offset = +5:45 |timezone_DST = |utc_offset_DST = |coordinates = |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_m = |postal_code_type = Postal Code |postal_code = 57300 |area_code = 027 |blank_name = |blank_info = |website = ilam.municipality.gov.np |footnotes = |numbers of wards = }} Ilam ( ) is a municipality in the Ilam District of Nepal. It is in the hilly region of Mechi zone in eastern Nepal. It is the headquarters of Mechi Zone and Ilam district. Nepali is spoken there, and English is also spoken in some offices. ==Related pages== *Development Regions of Nepal *zones of Nepal Category:Cities in Nepal Category:Municipalities of Nepal
title: Ilam Municipality
